targets.query: SELECT mean("PV_EInverter") FROM "pv_array_kpi" WHERE $timeFilter AND "PV_EInverter" <= 100 AND "PV_EInverter" > 0 GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("PV_EArray") FROM "pv_array_kpi" WHERE $timeFilter AND "PV_EArray" <= 100 GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("PV_FF") FROM "pv_array_kpi" WHERE "PV_FF" <= 1.0 AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("PV_THD_Ia") FROM "pv_array_kpi" WHERE $timeFilter AND "PV_THD_Ia" <= 1 GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("PV_THD_Ib") FROM "pv_array_kpi" WHERE $timeFilter AND "PV_THD_Ib" <= 1 GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("PV_THD_Ic") FROM "pv_array_kpi" WHERE $timeFilter AND  "PV_THD_Ic" <= 1 GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("PV_THD_Va") FROM "pv_array_kpi" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("PV_THD_Vb") FROM "pv_array_kpi" WHERE $timeFilter AND "PV_THD_Vb" <= 1 GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("PV_THD_Vc") FROM "pv_array_kpi" WHERE $timeFilter AND "PV_THD_Vc" <= 1 GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

SELECT sum(*) FROM 
 (SELECT median("PV_E") * 0.04 FROM "pv_array_kpi" WHERE $timeFilter and "PV_LD" > 8 and "PV_LD" < 12),
 (SELECT median("PV_E") * 0.05 FROM "pv_array_kpi" WHERE $timeFilter and "PV_LD" > 18 and "PV_LD" < 22),
 (SELECT median("PV_E") * 0.12 FROM "pv_array_kpi" WHERE $timeFilter and "PV_LD" > 28 and "PV_LD" < 32),
 (SELECT median("PV_E") * 0.21 FROM "pv_array_kpi" WHERE $timeFilter and "PV_LD" > 48 and "PV_LD" < 52),
 (SELECT median("PV_E") * 0.53 FROM "pv_array_kpi" WHERE $timeFilter and "PV_LD" > 73 and "PV_LD" < 77),
 (SELECT median("PV_E") * 0.05 FROM "pv_array_kpi" WHERE $timeFilter and "PV_LD" > 98);

SELECT 
    mean("PV_THD_Va") as "PV_THD_Va", 
    mean("PV_THD_Vb")  as "PV_THD_Vb",
    mean("PV_THD_Vc")  as "PV_THD_Vc"
FROM "pv_array_kpi" WHERE $timeFilter  AND "PV_LD" > 20 AND "PV_LD" < 30 GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT 
    mean("PV_THD_Va") as "PV_THD_Va", 
    mean("PV_THD_Vb")  as "PV_THD_Vb",
    mean("PV_THD_Vc")  as "PV_THD_Vc"
FROM "pv_array_kpi" WHERE $timeFilter  AND "PV_LD" > 40 AND "PV_LD" < 60 GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT
    mean("PV_THD_Va") as "PV_THD_Va", 
    mean("PV_THD_Vb")  as "PV_THD_Vb",
    mean("PV_THD_Vc")  as "PV_THD_Vc" 
FROM "pv_array_kpi" 
WHERE $timeFilter  AND "PV_LD" > 65 AND "PV_LD" < 85 GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT
    mean("PV_THD_Va") as "PV_THD_Va", 
    mean("PV_THD_Vb")  as "PV_THD_Vb",
    mean("PV_THD_Vc")  as "PV_THD_Vc"
FROM "pv_array_kpi" 
WHERE $timeFilter  AND "PV_LD" > 90 GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT 
    mean("PV_THD_Ia") as "PV_THD_Ia", 
    mean("PV_THD_Ib")  as "PV_THD_Ib",
    mean("PV_THD_Ic")  as "PV_THD_Ic"
FROM "pv_array_kpi" WHERE $timeFilter  AND "PV_LD" > 20 AND "PV_LD" < 30 GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT
    mean("PV_THD_Ia") as "PV_THD_Ia", 
    mean("PV_THD_Ib")  as "PV_THD_Ib",
    mean("PV_THD_Ic")  as "PV_THD_Ic"
 FROM "pv_array_kpi" WHERE $timeFilter  AND "PV_LD" > 40 AND "PV_LD" < 60 GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT
    mean("PV_THD_Ia") as "PV_THD_Ia", 
    mean("PV_THD_Ib")  as "PV_THD_Ib",
    mean("PV_THD_Ic")  as "PV_THD_Ic"
FROM "pv_array_kpi" 
WHERE $timeFilter  AND "PV_LD" > 65 AND "PV_LD" < 85 GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT
    mean("PV_THD_Ia") as "PV_THD_Ia", 
    mean("PV_THD_Ib")  as "PV_THD_Ib",
    mean("PV_THD_Ic")  as "PV_THD_Ic"
FROM "pv_array_kpi" 
WHERE $timeFilter  AND "PV_LD" > 90 GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT median("PV_E") * 0.04 FROM "pv_array_kpi" WHERE $timeFilter  and "PV_LD" > 8 and "PV_LD" < 12
SELECT median("PV_E") * 0.05 FROM "pv_array_kpi" WHERE $timeFilter  and "PV_LD" > 18 and "PV_LD" < 22
SELECT median("PV_E") * 0.12 FROM "pv_array_kpi" WHERE $timeFilter  and "PV_LD" > 28 and "PV_LD" < 32
SELECT median("PV_E") * 0.21 FROM "pv_array_kpi" WHERE $timeFilter  and "PV_LD" > 48 and "PV_LD" < 52
SELECT median("PV_E") * 0.53 FROM "pv_array_kpi" WHERE $timeFilter  and "PV_LD" > 73 and "PV_LD" < 77
SELECT median("PV_E") * 0.05 FROM "pv_array_kpi" WHERE $timeFilter  and "PV_LD" > 98
SELECT mean("PV_Pin") FROM "pv_array_kpi" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("PV_Pin") FROM "pv_array_kpi" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
